column2: "Da no na wɔbɔtow ndwom yi wɔ Juda asaase do dɛ: Yɛwɔ kurow a ɔyɛ dzen; obetsintsim nkwagye dɛ afasu na ntuae ban."

column3: ama ɔman tsenenee a odzi nokwar no aahɛn mu."
ebɔkora no asomdwee a odzi mu mu: osiandɛ ɔdze no werɛ hyɛ wo mu."

column2: "Hom ntwer EWURADZE daa daa: na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn mu na ɔdomankoma ɔbotantsim wɔ."

column5: ɔbrɛ no adze kɛka famu; nyew

column2: "Ɔtseneneenyi no kwan yɛ tɔɔtsen; ɔwo na eyɛ atseneneefo kwantsempɔn tɔɔtsen."

column5: na yɛahwɛ wo kwan: hɛn kra akɔndɔ gyina wo dzin ne nkaae do."

column3: mo sunsum a ɔwɔ mo mu hwehwɛ wo enyiberdo: na sɛ w'atsɛmbu ba asaase do a
onnsua ndzeyɛtsenenee; tɔɔtsenyɛ asaase do na odzi afomfonsɛm

column4: naaso wonnhu. Ma wonhu wo mbɔdzembɔ wɔ wo man ho

column3: ɔwoara bɛhyehyɛ asomdwee ama hɛn: na ɔwoara na edzi hɛn dwuma nyinara so ama hɛn."

column4: ewuranom bi so edzi hɛn do tum aka wo ho; naaso ɔwo nko wo dzin na yɛbɔ."
wɔnnkɔsoɛr: osiandɛ asera hɔn na asɛɛ hɔn
column5: na apepa hɔn ho nkaa nyina koraa."

column4: ama ɔman no adɔr; wɔahyɛ wo enyimnyam: ɔwo atserɛw asaase no n'ahe nyinara mu."
wo ntsea baa hɔn do no

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ ɔpemfo a ɔrebɛn n'awoo dzi yaw na ɔkeka mu wɔ n'awoko mu no; mbrɛ yɛayɛ wɔ w'enyim ara nye no

column4: ɔyɛ dɛ yɛawo mframa; yɛannyɛ ɔgye bi ho edwuma wɔ asaase do; eso wiadze mu mba nnhwehwee ase."

column2: "W'ewufo bɛtsena ase; hɔn efun bɔsoɛr. Hom a hom tse huntuma mu e
column3: hom nyan na hom ntow ehurusi ndwom. Na wo bɔsu yɛ kan bɔsu
column4: na asaase do ewufo do na ebɔtɔ egu."

column5: na hom ntotow homho mbobow mu: hom nhuntsa ber kakra
column6: ma onkodu dɛ ebufuhyew no botwa mu akɔ."

column3: EWURADZE fi ne tsebea rifir edzi abɛtsea asaase do mba wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi: asaase so bɛda no bɔgyaa edzi
